definition: knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]

sentences.english: You also mentioned that you suffered from ulcerated colitis. Are you currently taking prescribed medication?
sentences.chinese: 你也提到，因溃疡结肠炎。你目前正在用药物吗？

sentences.english: Pseudomembranous colitis has been reported with topical clindamycin.
sentences.chinese: 局部用克林霉素有报道可致假膜性结肠炎。

sentences.english: The germ can lead to a condition called colitis.
Give a summarization about traditional chinese medicine's cure development of Ulcerous colon disease.
sentences.chinese: 就近年来中医药治疗溃疡性结肠炎进展情况进行综述。

sentences.english: The systemic studies of Kuijieping Granule, a new drug for the treatment of colonitis, were made in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文对治疗结肠炎的溃结平颗粒作了较为系统的研究。

sentences.english: The response of astrocytes decreased with the recovery of the colonic inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 随着结肠炎的恢复，星形胶质细胞的反应性下降。

sentences.english: Clostridium difficile colitis remains a serious and common complication after liver transplantation.
sentences.chinese: 艰难梭菌结肠炎是肝移植后的常见和严重的并发症。

sentences.english: BHD has good treating effect on ulcerative colitis in mice model.
sentences.chinese: 结论补黄丹对小鼠溃疡性结肠炎有良好的治疗作用。

sentences.english: Dietary factors have been considered as a possible risk factor for ulcerative colitis(UC).
sentences.chinese: 饮食因素被认为是溃疡性结肠炎发病的危险因素。

sentences.english: Doctor: You also mentioned that you suffer from ulcerated colitis.
sentences.chinese: 你提到你得过溃疡性结肠炎。

sentences.english: Conclusions The pathogenic Y. enterocolitica can be detected in the domestic animals of JiLin province.
sentences.chinese: 结论在吉林省存在致病性小肠结肠炎耶尔森氏菌。

sentences.english: Can colonitis drink a sheep to suckle?
The most le al complication is fulminating colitis.
sentences.chinese: 最严重的致死性并发症是暴发性结肠炎。

sentences.english: A colonoscopic view of ischemic colitis with minimal overlying exudate is shown.
sentences.chinese: 有少量分泌物覆盖的缺血性结肠炎的结肠镜检图。

sentences.english: And colon cancer can be easily found among Americans, because of their high-fat meals.
sentences.chinese: 而结肠炎在美国很普遍，因为他们吃太多高脂肪食物。

pinyin: chang2 yi4 ji1 zong1 he2 zheng1
